an3.80:4.2: loke sahassaṁ → tasmiṁ sahassaṁ (sya-all, km, pts1ed)
an3.80:7.1: tisahassimahāsahassilokadhātuṁ → tisahassiṁ mahāsahassiṁ lokadhātuṁ (sya-all, km); tisahassīmahāsahassī lokadhātuṁ (pts1ed)
an3.80:9.1: āyasmantaṁ udāyiṁ → bhagavantaṁ (si ), cck, sya1ed, km potthakesu natthi. aṭṭhakathāya
